body.description: Our 2-Ply White Ultra Plus Individually Wrapped Toilet Paper/Bath Tissue pack contains (80) Toilet Tissue Rolls (400, 4.1' x 3.5' sheets per roll; 32,000 sheets total). With 80 rolls, this pack is great for away-from-home facilities such as, high-traffic commercial buildings, offices, restaurants, public restrooms, schools, hotels and healthcare. Made with a blend of premium performance with environmental responsibility: We are committed to using Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified paper, ensuring that our products come from forests managed pursuant to strict environmental, social, and economic standards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AmazonCommercial FSC Certified Ultra Plus Toilet Paper Toilet Tissue Rolls Ideal for use in high-traffic commercial buildings such as offices, facilities, restaurants, schools, hotels, and more. 2 Ply Absorbency The FSC certified 2-ply tissue offers a high level of absorbency and a great combination of strength and softness that’s gentle on skin (FSC N004130). Septic Safe The toilet tissue breaks down quickly in water, making it clog resistant and septic safe. Works with Universal Dispenser The toilet paper rolls work with any standard roll-style toilet paper dispenser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These rolls are great! Size - just as good as any other; softness and absorbency too! Price - such good value for money. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comparable to our favorite sams members mark mega rolls!
reviews.reviewText: So I was looking for a sams club/members mark dupe but this one reminds me most of dollar general's brand or angel soft because of the size of the roll. However, its MUCH softer than those.. really a bit softer than sams too! Each sheet feels very plush even for being commercial 2 ply! what! I LOVE IT! Its so much softer than I expected it could ever be and it resembles NOTHING like the tissue we consistently find ourselves using in facilities like store and clinic bathrooms. It owns a superior higher quality to all of those in my honest opinion for only being another "commercial" tissue. I was absolutely shocked and extremely pleased right away. I currently have some rolls left of sams members mark MEGA rolls (275 sheets per roll instead of their normal 235, a total of 1467.8 sq ft in a full case). The mega rolls are clearly bigger obviously its a "mega" roll (see pictures) but the quality is nearly equal to the new commercial rolls we now use. Also I'll include a picture of 3 sheets from each roll, the amazon sheets are a little shorter in measurement. But I'm a huge fan of these, even though I'm not used to seeing much smaller rolls in our bathroom lol but its wrapped in thin paper which keeps it fresh and from collecting lint or dust. I love that. Great for storage purposes. It also makes it easy to give to my neighbors on my street during these times to help everyone out and also to give to my family and friends in other towns ofcourse! I love the value ratio of cost to roll quality. This just cannot be beat. Seriously. This many amazing rolls for about twice what we usually pay. Im down for that and Im so glad I tried these despite some negative reviews I read!! I will definitely continue to get this brand whenever sams is sold out because they are basically like sisters as far as quality, I'm not disappointed AT ALL! My oldest child thinks it's the softest tissue ever, softer than our sams staple which I do kind of agree with. *Its not too soft that it tears apart during use. In fact it does not tear or leave anything behind at all.. no lint, no debris. Dissolves fast enough in the water that our toilet never choked on it like it usually does with thicker premium ply tissues xD Its got a medium absorbency, a little less than sams but its totally ok! It was so awesome to my entire family that I had to review it. No regrets whatsoever. One of the best gambles I've made shopping here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great tissue, strong and fair price.. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great amount for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Great amount for the price, the squares come apart too easily but get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Good Middle Of The Road Choice
reviews.reviewText: When the pandemic hit we were one of the couples who frequented the supermarket to stock up with toilet paper and paper towels, among other things. Some years back, I had bought a box of 96 rolls of highly discounted, single-ply toilet paper from a retail store. It lasted a long time. After reading some of the reviews on Amazon’s Ultra Plus Commercial Toilet Paper I decided to try it, with my wife’s approval. I ordered the 80 roll box on September 19, 2020. We intended to hold onto the Ultra Plus as backup toilet paper and continue buying additional toilet paper as we had been.After having the Amazon toilet paper sitting in the garage for a year, we decided to start using it. I didn’t know what to expect, thinking that it may not be quite as good as I had hoped for…a little too thin, not very strong, etc. I was surprised to find that it was pretty comparable to most of the toilet paper we had been buying on sale.Before writing this review, I researched reviews on the “best toilet paper”. It seems to me that choosing toilet paper is all about personal preference. Each brand and different types of toilet paper in each brand have its plusses and minuses. The adage that you get what you pay for also applies. The best-performing brands are generally pricier.Amazon’s Ultra Plus Commercial Toilet Paper is certainly competitive with other brands, considering price, strength, and comfort. It seems to fit in between pricier, premium, and basic necessity toilet paper. The convenience of having a box of toilet paper with 80 rolls in it, individually wrapped, is nice. If the price for a box of it is attractive to you, and you want to try something a little different from what you’ve been using, it is something to consider.By the way, my wife still prefers and uses, the basic single-ply major brand toilet paper. I’ll use anything, but this is a good choice, in my opinion. I’ve included some pics of toilet paper that we had already bought on sale to compare with the Ultra Plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toilet tissue. Awesome buy.
reviews.reviewText: I've been ordering this case of Amazon toilet paper for about 2 years. I am pleased with the quality and price. And to them individually wrapped is a must have for me. I highly recommend this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: Our family orders the Amazon commercial toilet paper all the time. The are of great quality and is not made of that cheap single ply you get when using public restrooms. The amount of toilet paper you get in this buy is worth the price. Such a great buy for your buck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We weren't expecting this product to compare with what we had been purchasing from our local grocery, but prices going up forced us to buy in bulk and I have to say, this is very comparable in size and softness and the price is excellent. It's 2 ply and soft and absorbent enough for us. Quality is a little subpar in that the sheets sometimes peel off as it's unrolled, but not a problem. I will buy again. At 30 cents less per roll, this tp is our go to now.

Me gusta que no tiene olor. Es resistente y bastante duradero. Es suave , pues al ser marca propia de Amazon, no esperaba que fuera tan suave .Ya can dos veces que pido la caja de 80 rollos y me llega en muy buen estado y al día siguiente.Me encanta que tenga envoltura individual pues lo protege ( de polvo, agua, etc) mientras está en el mueble de del baño .Seguiré comprándolo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great value, soft, strong & don’t break up like others do.
reviews.reviewText: Looking some of the reviews that weren’t so good I figured I’d take a chance. Ok so big value and rolls are nicely in a big box. Ok so what do I think let’s start. The Rolls are soft, strong this I must say they don’t break up like the really cheap toilet paper these tools are strong and I’m very impressed. They are soft not said paper so I don’t know where some reviewers got this idea. I’m truthful and I like them very much. The rolls are not overly big rolls but they are a good size.

Sin duda, uno de los mejores papeles higiénicos que he comprado (incluidos los de Kirkland y Cotsco). Ligeramente de menor tamaño por hoja que los otros mencionados sin embargo más resistentes y de igual o mejor suavidad. Volveré a comprar sin duda.

I am liking this so far. Solid yet not harsh, it is really good! My toilet paper holder normally holds four extra rolls underneath but this Amazon rolls seem to be much bigger (higher?) than the normal rolls. My forth spare role barely fits in my toilet paper holder, which is nothing wrong actually. I assume this is the reason is that I can keep one roll much longer than the regular rolls.
We like that it’s individually wrapped and came in a large quantity.
